feed.title: T7 Nerds
feed.subtitle: A D&D Microsite for session logs, primers, etc.

entry.title: A Nothic's Eye
entry.content: A nothic presented itself to Skellyfingers and Odious in the ruined temple to the Shadow. It promised great knowledge, but in the end a fight broke out.

entry.title: Cryovain's Desire
entry.content: Skelly confronted Cryovain the White and ended up handing over one of the two knowledge stones recovered from the Temple of the Shadow. Gray Plague Spore joined the group on their way to report back to the Red Baron.

entry.title: A Wee Termite Problem
entry.content: The party met Falcon the Hunter as he was about to rush a wounded man to Adabra. He told them to go to the nearby woodcutter's camp and deal with a potential threat there. Upon arrival, the party found several huge insectoid creatures lurking below the ground.

entry.title: Off to the Barrow
entry.content: After cleaning up the remaining Ankhegs at the Woodcutter's Camp, the party trekked northeast to the dragon barrow in search of useful tools.

entry.title: The Dragon Barrow
entry.content: Our party forged ahead down into the barrow, and ended up finding a lot of kobolds looking for something. Bloodshed ensued.

entry.title: Riddles and Bones
entry.content: After the fighting, the party set about the business of investigting the barrow. Searching for anything that might help them "Kill a Dragon," Odious' studies of the Draconic Prophesy gave him a clue as to what they might find.
